Class Block

java.lang.Object
  Block

public class Block
extends java.lang.Object

Object that represents an encoded packet.

Author:
José Lopes

          Size of the encoded content.

Block

public Block(long seed,
             int degree,
             int blockSize)
Creates a new instance of Block.

Parameters:
seed - Value to be used as a seed for the soliton distribution.
degree - Degree of this packet.
blockSize - Size of the encoded content on the packet.

xor

public void xor(byte[] input)
         throws java.lang.NullPointerException
XORs the input given with the encoded content of this packet.

Parameters:
input - Input to be XORed with the encoded content of this packet. Will be truncated if bigger than blockSize, and padded with '0's if shorter.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - In case data or input are null.
